= Scorched Moon server commands =

As the Scorched Moon server progresses testing will have to be done manually without the benefit of a client. This page lists all of the server commands and what they do. Usage is the command, followed by any following variables %s string, %i integer. 


= Command List =

Currently implemented commands
  * exit - Disconnects user from server
  * shutdown - Cleanly shuts down server

Partially implemented commands
  * broadcast %s - Broadcasts to all users, currently isn't able to strip out the message as part of the command so only broadcasts a preset message.


Currently planned commands
  * chat %s - sends %s as chat to select users
  * version - sends user current server version
  * username %s - sets %s as players username
